script.name: Foundation Pass
script.description: Narration foundation - Script parsing & cleanup, chapter segmentation, reading flow optimization, pronunciation normalization, voice pacing guidance, narration-ready master script, watermarked sample excerpt.

script.name: Audio Flow Pass
script.description: Pacing & timing - Chapter timing normalization, pause and emphasis mapping, listener fatigue reduction, runtime estimates per chapter. About listening endurance, not performance.

script.name: Voice Pass
script.description: Narration voice - Full narration (AI or guided), consistent voice profile, chapter-by-chapter audio files. Clear, intelligible narration suitable for long-form listening.

script.name: Audio Finish Pass
script.description: Mastering - Noise leveling, compression & EQ, loudness normalization, platform-safe WAV/MP3 exports. Ensures audio meets baseline platform expectations.
